TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AppDomainManagerInitializationOptions extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the action that a custom application domain manager takes when initializing a new domain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks These flags are used for property settings in the <xref:System.AppDomainManager> class. The AppDomainManagerInitializationOptions flags apply only to custom application domain managers; they do not apply to the default manager. The <xref:System.AppDomainManager.InitializeNewDomain%2A> method in the default application domain manager does nothing. The default enumeration value is None.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.AppDomainManagerInitializationOptions None = int32(0)
.field public static literal valuetype System.AppDomainManagerInitializationOptions RegisterWithHost = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Register the COM callable wrapper for the current with the unmanaged host.
